evidence.source_document: Memorandum of Points and Authorities Supporting Plaintiff American Foreign Service Association's Motion for Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: These negotiations cover a wide range of Foreign Service members’ employment including but not limited to assignment procedures, tenure and promotion board procedures, agency-level grievance procedures, time-in-class and time-in-service rules and disciplinary procedures.
